amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in support of grassroots advocacy campaigns intended to persuade the outcome of legislation pending in Congress or state legislatures.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in support of grassroots advocacy campaigns intended to persuade the outcome of legislation pending in Congress or state legislatures.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
